import React from 'react' import { Tab, Tabs } from 'react-bootstrap' import AddCustomerComponent from '../../components/customer/addCustomer.component' import ViewCustomersComponent from '../../components/customer/viewCustomers.component' import PerformSaleComponent from '../../components/performSale/performSale.component' import AddToInventoryComponent from '../../components/savingToInventory/AddToInventory.component' import ViewSaleComponent from '../../components/viewSale.component' import { withRouter, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class AdminDashBoard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) const { history } = this.props let data = sessionStorage.getItem('user') data = JSON.parse(data) if (!data) history.push('/Login') this.state = { user: data } } componentDidMount() { const { history } = this.props let user = this.state.user console.log(user) if (!user) history.push('/Login') } render() { const { history } = this.props console.log('history is: ', history) return

Computer Village Store

user

Your Profile

{this.state.user.firstName}
} } export default withRouter(AdminDashBoard);
